category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_search_show_all_filters
preference.preference_description: Show all the classification filter categories and filter values through pagination. Filter by value search will show all matching results. The default value is true. Valid values are true or false. * true : Show all the classification filter categories and filter values. * false : Do not show classification filter categories.
